item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_title icon_before_type="image" smart_fs="true" text_center="true" id="cz_90958" sk_overall="padding-top:70px;" image_as_icon="1193" sk_icon_before="margin-top:5px;margin-right:30px;RTLmargin-right:0px;margin-left:30px;RTL" sk_icon_before_mobile="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:30px;margin-left:0px;"]

Welcome to Home Cleaning

Make an appointment or request service[/cz_title][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_content_box type="1" id="cz_48943" sk_overall="color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;padding:40px 50px;margin-top:-300px;margin-right:50px;margin-left:50px;box-shadow:0px 10px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);" sk_overall_tablet="margin-top:60px;margin-right:0px;margin-left:0px;" sk_overall_mobile="padding:30px;"][cz_contact_form_7 cf7="Home Page Cleaning Form" id="cz_82257" sk_p_1="width:46%;" sk_p_2="width:46%;float:right;RTLfloat:left;RTL" sk_p_3="width:46%;" sk_p_4="width:46%;float:right;RTLfloat:left;RTL" sk_p_6="width:46%;" sk_p_7="width:46%;float:right;RTLfloat:left;RTL" sk_label="font-size:16px;color:#898989;" sk_select="font-size:16px;" sk_button="font-size:16px;width:100%;padding-top:15px;padding-bottom:15px;margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:-10px;" sk_button_mobile="font-size:14px;"][/cz_content_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][cz_gap height="125px" height_mobile="80px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces"][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_image id="cz_16711" image="1224" svg_bg="_class_svg_type:dots;_class_svg_size:2;_class_svg_color:#ec2f2b;top:75px;" svg_bg_mobile="top:40px;"][/cz_image][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_content_box type="1" id="cz_43212" sk_overall="color:#ffffff;background-color:#2a65a1;padding:60px 65px;margin-top:80px;box-shadow:0px 10px 70px 0px rgba(42,101,161,0.35);" sk_overall_mobile="padding:60px 30px 70px;margin-top:100px;"][cz_title icon_before_type="image" smart_fs="true" text_center="true" id="cz_57494" sk_overall="padding-top:10px;" image_as_icon="1225" sk_icon_before="margin-top:5px;margin-right:30px;RTLmargin-right:0px;margin-left:30px;RTL" sk_icon_before_mobile="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:30px;margin-left:0px;"]

About Our Cleaning Group

We are expert in home cleaning[/cz_title][cz_gap height="30px"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_26912" sk_overall="color:#ffffff;CDVZmax-width:700px;CDVZ"]Some of our customers prefer to schedule a one-time clean based on their needs. Whether they’re expecting company or just hosted a party, our occasional cleaning service gets their home in tip-top shape.[/cz_title][cz_gap][cz_stylish_list id="cz_42978" items="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Commercial%20Cleaning%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Building%20Cleaning%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Home%20Cleaning%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Vehicle%20Cleaning%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Regular%20Cleaning%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Occasional%20Cleaning%22%2C%22icon_type%22%3A%22icon%22%7D%5D" default_icon="fa czico-022-shield-4" sk_overall="CDVZmax-width:700px;CDVZ" sk_lists="font-size:20px;width:50%;margin-bottom:15px;float:left;" sk_icons="font-size:26px;color:#ffffff;background-color:#ec2f2b;border-radius:100%;" sk_lists_mobile="width:100%;" sk_icons_hover="color:#ec2f2b;background-color:#ffeb3b;"][/cz_content_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][cz_gap height="150px" height_mobile="80px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_gap height="25px"][cz_title icon_before_type="image" smart_fs="true" text_center="true" id="cz_63728" image_as_icon="1237" sk_icon_before="margin-top:5px;margin-right:30px;RTLmargin-right:0px;margin-left:30px;RTL" sk_icon_before_mobile="margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:30px;margin-left:0px;"]

What We Can Do for you?

How we works and what we do[/cz_title][cz_gap height="75px"][cz_process_line_vertical id="cz_110981" sk_num="font-size:26px;color:#ffffff;font-weight:700;background-color:#ec2f2b;padding:5px;margin-top:-18px;margin-left:-4px;border-style:solid;border-width:2px;border-color:#ec2f2b;box-shadow:0px 10px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);" sk_line="background-color:#ec2f2b;" sk_num_hover="CDVZtransform:scale(1.2);CDVZ"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_51786" sk_overall="padding-right:20px;padding-left:20px;" cz_title=""]

All Cleaning Services

Not home? No problem! Our cleaning team will dust, vacuum and scrub while you're out enjoying some free time.[/cz_title][/cz_process_line_vertical][cz_process_line_vertical number="2" id="cz_60276" sk_num="color:#ec2f2b;font-weight:700;padding:10px;margin-top:-12px;margin-left:-4px;border-style:solid;border-width:2px;" sk_line="background-color:#ec2f2b;" sk_num_hover="CDVZtransform:scale(1.2);CDVZ"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_52502" sk_overall="padding-right:20px;padding-left:20px;" cz_title=""]

What Rooms Are Included?

XTRA Cleaning you need every room in the house cleaned or just a few rooms-it’s up to you.[/cz_title][/cz_process_line_vertical][cz_free_position_element id="cz_85559" css_top="53.08441558441559%" css_left="-29.92125984251969%" css_width="70px"][cz_social_icons parallax_h="v" parallax="15" id="cz_15427" social="%5B%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20czico-128-add-3%22%7D%5D" sk_icons="font-size:60px;color:#2a65a1;opacity:0.7;filter:blur(10px);transform:rotate(-45deg);"][/cz_free_position_element][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-md-6"][cz_image parallax_h="true" parallax="5" id="cz_77647" image="1199" sk_css="z-index:-1;" sk_css_mobile="margin-top:75px;"][/cz_image][cz_free_position_element css_z-index="1" id="cz_84248" css_top="11.525974025974026%" css_left="94.64074803149606%" css_width="70px"][cz_social_icons parallax_h="v" parallax="-14" id="cz_57020" social="%5B%7B%22icon%22%3A%22fa%20czico-128-add-3%22%7D%5D" sk_icons="font-size:140px;color:#ffeb3b;opacity:0.8;filter:blur(8px);transform:rotate(-45deg);"][/cz_free_position_element][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1537207315357{background: #2a65a1 url(https://xtratheme.com/cleaning/wp-content/uploads/sites/70/2018/09/pgb.jpg?id=1334) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][cz_gap height="125px"][cz_image size="thumbnail" css_position="relative;display: table;margin:0 auto" id="cz_74322" image="1249" sk_css="padding-bottom:30px;"][/cz_image][cz_title smart_fs="true" text_center="true" id="cz_65897" sk_overall="color:#ffffff;"]

Our Quick Cleaning Packages Anywhere

Want quick cleaning at your office, apartment, etc.

[/cz_title][cz_gap height="60px"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" offset="vc_col-md-3"][cz_content_box type="2" split_box_position="cz_split_box_top" fx_hover="fx_zoom_0_hover" split_box_hide_arrow="true" id="cz_70019" split_box_image="1279" sk_overall="color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;box-shadow:0px 10px 50px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);" sk_image_hover="filter:grayscale(100%);"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_83454"]

01.

Regular Cleaning

[/cz_title][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_107910" sk_overall="padding-top:20px;"]Life is stressful and so is keeping a clean home[/cz_title][/cz_content_box][cz_gap height="30px"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1537251024807{padding-left: px !important;}" offset="vc_col-md-3"][cz_content_box type="2" split_box_position="cz_split_box_bottom" fx_hover="fx_zoom_0_hover" split_box_hide_arrow="true" id="cz_11216" split_box_image="1280" sk_overall="color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;box-shadow:0px 10px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);"][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_98592"]

02.

Occasional Cleaning

[/cz_title][cz_title text_center="true" id="cz_94896" sk_overall="padding-top:20px;"]Holiday approaching? item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

In the beautiful surroundings of Upcote Farm in Cheltenham, 2000 Trees festival is a gem of a find if you’ve been lucky enough…I found this festival in 2008 when ‘Reuben’ were due to headline, but even though they disbanded a few weeks prior to the festival, us fans still decided to turn up, and boy am I glad I did… Being a small sized 5000 capacity festival, but not enough to have 20 minute waits at the bars and toilets. The balance between atmosphere and accessibility is second to none. The food stalls are all hand picked, the same with the local ciders/ales and beers, the organisers have really nailed it on the head, you can tell they themselves are, as well as bringing in some big names, it really does cater for every type music fan. In the beautiful surroundings of Upcote Farm in Cheltenham, 2000 Trees festival is a gem of a find if you’ve been lucky enough…I found this festival in 2008 when ‘Reuben’ were due to headline, but even though they disbanded a few weeks prior to the festival, us fans still decided to turn up, and boy am I glad I did… Being a small sized 5000 capacity festival, but not enough to have 20 minute waits at the bars and toilets. The balance between atmosphere and accessibility is second to none. The food stalls are all hand picked, the same with the local ciders/ales and beers, the organisers have really nailed it on the head, you can tell they themselves are, as well as bringing in some big names, it really does cater for every type music fan. I love hoodies, and ninjas, so what could be better than a ninja hoodie? Not much, if you ask me!
This is the most bombastic hoodie in this shop, it's soft and has the sly WooThemes ninja on it. Why wouldn't you buy this?
This only gets 1 star because I don't have this yet. I want it now!
The best hoodie ever!
